005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009
010import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
011
012/**
013 * A base class for a flag that is a member of a containing model.
014 *
015 * @param <PARENT>
016 *          the Java type of the parent model (i.e., assembly, field).
017 * @param <DEFINITION>
018 *          the Java type of the definition for this member flag
019 * @param <INSTANCE>
020 *          the Java type of the instance for this member flag
021 */
022public abstract class AbstractFlagInstance<
023    PARENT extends IModelDefinition,
024    DEFINITION extends IFlagDefinition,
025    INSTANCE extends IFlagInstance>
026    extends AbstractNamedInstance<PARENT>
027    implements IFlagInstance, IFeatureDefinitionReferenceInstance<DEFINITION, INSTANCE> {
028
029  /**
030   * Construct a new flag instance.
031   *
032   * @param parent
033   *          the parent model containing this instance
034   */
035  protected AbstractFlagInstance(@NonNull PARENT parent) {
036    super(parent, name -> parent.getContainingModule().toFlagQName(name));
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  public DEFINITION getDefinition() {
041    // this should always be not null
042    return ObjectUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(
043        getContainingModule()
044            .getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(getReferencedDefinitionQName())));
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public final PARENT getContainingDefinition() {
049    return getParentContainer();
050  }
051
052  /**
053   * Generates a "coordinate" string for the assembly instance.
054   *
055   * @return the coordinate
056   */
057  @SuppressWarnings("null")
058  @Override
059  public String toCoordinates() {
060    IDefinition definition = getDefinition();
061    return String.format("flag instance %s -> %s in module %s (@%d(%d)",
062        getXmlQName(),
063        definition.getDefinitionQName(),
064        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
065        hashCode(),
066        definition.hashCode());
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public IModule getContainingModule() {
071    return getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule();
072  }
073}
